name: task_1
description: 1. Create a folder named `task_1`, cd into it, and create a `package.json` using `npm init -y`. 2. Install webpack (dev dependency), jQuery (dependency), and Lodash (dependency) within the folder using npm. 3. Modify your `package.json` to add a build script that runs webpack to create a production build. This lets you execute `npm run build` on the command line.
